meanings.definition: A technique that uses the interference of waves to make precise measurements.
meanings.sent1: Interferometry helps scientists measure things very accurately.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used interferometry to study the light waves.
meanings.sent3: The aliens tried to use interferometry to measure the size of Earth's oceans, but they got confused by the ripples.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was like interferometry, picking up on the smallest changes in the room.
meanings.sent5: Using interferometry is like having a superpower to see things invisible to the naked eye.
